1.content: First of all, are you a hero or a villain?
1.title: Welcome to New Wolf City

111.content:
Name: Ice Fang
Species: Wolf
Powers: Water/Ice manipulation, hidden blades.
Personality: When he was little he was aware of his powers and at times he couldn’t control them. One day a group of virulently came and they brought them into there group so they could train him. He rarely talks with others (Unless they are very close to him) and quite disciplined, however when he is under is mask he can (Once in a blue moon) become a little cocky and will crack a one liner or two if he feels like it.
Description: He wears a black hooded clock with long sleeves (To hide his hidden weapons) and he wears a white Japanese style wolf mask with blue markings on the sides of the mouth and eyes. Weapon dispensers are hidden on his arms to ether shoot out throwing stars or dispense any blade he may need into his hand. (Safely)
Now what are you up to?
111.title: Ice Fang

choices: Looks like Konran found some friends.
1111.content: It’s a quiet night in New Wolf City, as things seem calm on a normal street. A young teenage cat girl is walking home when she is then grabbed by the arm and pulled into an allay. “Mhmmmhm.” the girl try’s to scream but her mouth is covered. “My my what an interesting specimen you are. Such nice soft fur.” the shadowy figure says as he proceeds to take a black marker and draw a few lines on her stomach “Now then where should I make the first incision.” The girl try’s to scream when she sees a scalpel in the figures hand. “Now shall we turn that smooth skin into sand paper?” the figure says as he rises the scalpel into the air. Then the scalpel is stuck by a throwing knife and the shadow drops the scalpel and releases the girl as she then runs away. You stand on the roof top looking down at the shadowy figure. “Mad Scientist Konran,!” you shout “You are under arrest!” “Oh come now fangy lighten up.” Konran steps out into the moonlight and you see a lizard wearing a lab coat and has stitches all over his head and arms “I was only going to examine her and let her go is that so much to ask?” “You can’t go around dissecting people Konran!” you shout as you have a sword drop out from your sleeve “Time to take you in.” “You have to catch me first.” Konran shouts as he starts running. “That guy is insane.” you say as you leap off the building and chase after him. You draw water from the air and you use it to slide across the surface of the water. “Hahahahaha lets see how you corner goody two shoes!” Konran shouts as he turns a corner. “As you slide by you grab a lamp post and turn the corner quickly. Konran keeps this up turning multiple corners but you still manage to keep up some how. Soon he manages to lose you but you can see where he went. “You can’t hide forever Konran!” you shout as you walk. As you turn a corner you soon see…
1111.title: Enter Ice Fang

choices: Stopping a theif from robbing a jewelry store
112.content:
Name: Redeemer
Species: Raptor
Powers: Wind manipulation, Hand to Hand ace
Personality: When he was young he could always feel his powers. His emotions triggered his powers around that time. But as he got older he learned how to control his powers. When he gained control of his powers, he felt like everything was slow. But he was actually faster. He has a slightly hyperactive personality making him talk faster than normal. His speed is unrivalled as well as his hand to hand combat.
Description: A slight breeze is always there when he is near. He wears a loose white shirt with black tracksuit pants. The loose white shirt is always rippling in the breeze. He always wears black biker gloves to show his combat expertise. He wears a a karate style headband around his head & black sunglasses cover his eyes.

Now what are you up to?
112.title: Redeemer

113.content:
Name:Crimson
Species:Dragon
Powers:Fire manipulator
Personality:He`s not much of a talker and has a real cold outlook on things.He would prefer to laze around instead of fighting crime.He`s not really much of a hero but he certainly isnt a villain.He enjoys very little and at times its bringing other people down that can put him in a good mood.To put it easily he`s pesimistic,cynical,lazy and amoral.He could always control fire but he wasnt always a dragon when he was younger he was abducted by the military and experimented on.They thought that they had created a cold blooded killer but to their dismay he was very unmotivated.He escaped after they deemed him a failure and tried to kill him and has been seeking sanctuary in New Wolf City ever since then.
Description:He wears a leather jacket that is torn at the elbows and shoulders because of spikes that emerge there.He wears black pants torn at the knees due to more spikes and torn at the back because of his tail.His shoes are torn because of claws on his feet.Finally he wears a gas mask.
Physically he is strong,but he isnt ripping with muscles, he is pretty skinny.He has two horns on his head.His tail is long and whip like and he has full use of it.He doesnt have wings because he escaped before the experimenting got that far.Due to his fire powers he can breath it or use it from his hands.His clothes are fire proof.Despite the use of his tail as a whip he carries an actual whip with him as his weapon of choice.

Now whats he up to?
113.title: Crimson

1131.content:
I ran through the rooftops of the tall buildings that contributed to New Wolf Cities skyline.I can easily make the jump between each building and when it comes to a large gap some fire can give a boost.I stopped at the edge of one building and looked at my reflection in a window of the building opposite.My face concealed by the black gas mask.It had two eyeholes that were covered over by some material that prevented gas getting in and still enabling top vision.There were two small nozzle`s that stuck out of the underside of my snout.I chose to wear this mask,not to install fear or to protect myself from any kind of toxic fumes or gases, but just because I dont want the world to see me.
I jumped off the side of the building and fell towards an empty street.Just before hitting the pavement I used my whip and swung around a lamp post landing unharmed.This is one of the few streets that doesnt bustle with the cities night life and is why I spend most my time here.But sadly the quietness of this street also results in higher crime rates than other parts.Suddenly I hear sirens that are pretty close by.What should I do?
1131.title: Patrolling

114.content:
Name: The Tomcat Avenger

Species: Cat

Powers: Gadgets

Personality: Schoolteacher, Johnathin Tabbis was once served in the army and is trained in engineering. In his unit he is trained in turning ordenary objects into extrodinary weapons. That served him well when his unit faced terrorists that took over a power plant threatening to distroy it and turned a area into a radioactive wasteland. Now he served his country he turns his attention to teaching children at New Wolf High, but he uses his talents to fight crime as The Tomcat Avenger.

Description: His costume is that he wears a altered milatary uniform with body armor for protection, he wears a bandana over his eyes with eyeholes to see. His signiture weapon is a wrist-whip. A wristband with an unbreakable fiberwire that extends when he flicks his wrist. Not only does it used like a bullwhip, but it can easily grab, and ties up crooks. Underneith his bandana is a high tech helmet with a wireless access to a crime computer and most of the gadgets he uses such as a tracer chip launched from his wrist device in for tracking crooks.


What's Johnathin Tabbis/Tomcat Avenger doing now?
114.title: The Tomcat Avenger

choices: Tomcat is alerted that there's a hostage situation.
An unfortunate criminal runs into Tomcat
1141.content:
In an alley somewhere in New Wolf City, a fox wino is laying on the ground with a bottle of booze in one hand and singing a drunk song with no one else around, Four anthro lizards comes in each wearing a white jumpsuits. One(their leader) carries a cane, they applaud to the fox as he finishes his song "Bravo, bravo."

Fox: "Care to spare some change friend?"

The four lizards just laughs and suddenly the leader thrusts forward and pins the fox with the cane.

Fox: "Well, go on, do me in you bastard cowards! I don't want to live anyway, not in a stinking world like this!"

Gang leader: "Oh? And what's so stinking about it?"

Fox: "It's a stinking world because there's no law and order anymore! It's a stinking world because it lets the young get on to the old, like you done. Oh, it's no world for an old man any longer. What sort of a world is it at all? Anthros on the moon, and anthros spinning around the world, and there's not no attention paid to earthly law and order no more."

The Fox begins singing again and the gang leader lifts the cane it hit the old vulpin and suddenly a whirring sound is heard as a string of cable came from the darkness, it's magnetic tip grabs the metal handle of the cane and retracts back to a figure wearing a modified uniform and bandana.

Tomcat Avenger: "Does your mother ever tell you to respect your elders?"

Gang member 1: "How dare you spoil our fun?"

Gang leader: "I don't know you are, but challenging us is a big mistake! Get him boys!"

The 3 gang members surround the Tomcat Avenger, one rushes him only to countered by two quick jabs.

Gang member 2: "Time to clean your clock."

The 2nd. Gang member takes a crow bar and tries to hit Tomcat Avenger, but he ducks and the gang member ends up running into the wall.

The 3rd. gang member tries to ram him down only to be grabbed by Tomcat Avenger.

Tomcat Avenger "*sniff sniff* Ugh, drencrom. No wonder your all so agressive. This synthetic drug not only makes your senses sharper. It also lowers your IQ."

Tomcat Avenger punches him out with a haymaker.

Tomcat Avenger turns to the Gang leader "Now as for you."

The gang leader yells and runs towards Tomcat Avenger only to get flipped and land into a dumpster.

Tomcat Avenger: "Just as I thought, nothing but garbage."

Fox: "Thanks for saving me."

Tomcat Avenger: "No problem, just doing my job."
1141.title: Fighting crime

choices: An old enimy of Tiffany's strikes
11413.content:
As Tomcat Avenger left the alley, he suddenly remembered something. Johnathin Tabbis' best sudent Tiffany Tigre is supposed to be at the High School dance that night and he promised him that he'll be there for her. So he rushed over to New Wolf High and ducked into a storage shed to change back into Johnathing Tabbis. As he came out he's now dressed in a tuxido with a nicely comed headfur. He went to the school gym and found Tiffany.

Tiffany: Mr. Tabbis. I was wondering where you were.

Johnathin: Sorry Tiffany, busy grading and lost track of time but I'm here as promised.

Tiffany: How do I look?

Tiffany is dressed like a southern belle much like Scarlette from Gone with the wind.

Johnathin: You look mighty fetching, in other words beautiful. You'll have no trouble finding a partner to dance with.

Tiffany: Thanks, it means a lot to me, right now I fell nervous.

Johnathing: Now go out there and have fun.

Tiffany goes out to near the dancefloor with the rest of the girls he smiles as the school jock, Leo Pufftail, a lion offers to dance with tiffany.
11413.title: Back to school

114131.content:
As Leo and Tiffany is about to dance, suddenly a yellow gas seeps in from the vents, "Oh my god! We're being gassed!" most of the dancers said and started to run in panic, even Leo but Tiffany is dumbfounded.

"That can only be Nightmare." Johanathing said to himself as he pulls out a gas mask hidden under his jacket. He quickly went behind the curtain and came out once again as the Tomcat Avenger and positioned himself by the door which was then kicked down when Nightmare came in.

"Hello Tiffany!" Nightmare said in a low chuckle.

Tiffany screamed when she saw Nightmare and ran away.

Tomcat Avenger surprised Nightmare with a leg sweep and knocked her to the ground.

Nightmare looked directly at the Tomcat Avenger.


"Who the hell are you?" She snarled
114131.title: Nightmare attacks

choices: She's unable to free herself, she's going to jail.
1141311.content:
He answer "I'm the Tomcat Avenger." As he begins the fight he release his wrist whip and tied her legs good and tight.

Nightmare then tries to flick her tail in the Tomcat Avenger's face, but he dodged it easily.

Nightmare started to thrash and whinny violently, she couldn't figure out how to free herself.
1141311.title: Answer her

11413112.content:
Nightmare was unable to free herself, The Tomcat put handcuffs on her and took her away to jail.

As the door slammed shut you could hear Nightmare scream into the night

"NEXT TIME, TOMCAT AVENGER! ...NEXT...TIME!"

Tomcat Avenger: I will be waiting Nightmare.

For that Tomcat Avenger heads back into the city as the sun rises to a new day.
11413112.title: She's unable to free herself, she's goi...

choices: In front of the city museum
On an intersection causing mayhem to the public
114131121.content:
The following night Tomcat Avenger is on Patrol until he got a incoming call from his headset, it's Ice Fang.

Ice Fang: Tomcat Avenger, I need your help downtown a new villain is attacking.

Tomcat Avenger: Are you sure it's not Mad Scientist Konran?

Ice Fang: Unless he traded in his labcoat for a trench coat, it's not him.

Tomcat Avenger: I'm on my way.

Tomcat Avenger heads towards downtown and see's Ice Fang on a nearby rooftop.

Tomcat Avenger: Who is this new villain?

Ice Fang: He calls himself Jack-O-Lantern and believe me, he's a tough one.

Tomcat Avenger: If he's like Nightmare, he should be no problem.

Ice Fang shows Tomcat Avenger on where Jack-O-Lantern is.
114131121.title: The next day

choices: Ruby tells him she is just tired
Ruby confesses that she has a crush on him
1143.content:
Johnathin Tabbis just wrapped up History Class, topic is on how New Wolf City came to be. He spotted his co-worker, music teacher Ruby Tuesday

Johnathin: Good Afternoon Ruby! Lovely weather we're having isn't it?

Ruby: Oh, The weather. Right. It's just...peachy.

Johnathin notices that Ruby is behaving a little strangly.

Johnathin: Are you all right Ruby? You look feverish.
1143.title: A Talk with Ruby Tuesday

choices: He investigates trouble involving some new eco-terrorist
Just a routine patrol, no signs of trouble
11431.content:
Ruby: Sorry, I'm just tired and need a rest.

Ruby ran off, Johnathing just shrugs and head out to his car.

As he drove on home, he should have a light dinner and go on patrol as the Tomcat Avenger, there are planty of heroes out there Like Melody, Massive and the Enforcer, but even they need help every now and then. Who knows?

Later that night.
11431.title: Ruby tells him she is just tired

choices: A fight between the Tomcat Avenger and the Eco-Terrorists starts
114311.content:
Just then, the readout of his H.U.D. reports that a tremor is in progress over at Wrex Industries so he went over and investigate, he landed on the roof across it and sees that the building is almost covered in weeds, looking down he sees Wrex facing a giant Venus Flytrap.

Tomcat Avenger: It seems that Wrex has a few weeds in his garden, time for some pruning.

Tomcat Avenger fires darts from his wrist device hitting the giant plant by it's roots causing it to roar with pain and fall to the side.

A villainess fell out of the plants mouth, when she noticed her plant was in pain she stroked it tenderly and tried to remove the darts from the roots.

Villainess: Who did this?

Tomcat Avenger: It was me.
114311.title: He investigates trouble involving some new eco-...

1151.content:
Name: Sweet Charity

Species: Cobra

Powers: Healing (Of herself and others) and Venom

Personalty: Charity Serpentine was very shy and awkward in high school, due to the unsavory reputation surrounding snakes, Charity was bulled ruthlessly by kids who thought all snakes were evil, as the bullying got more and more viscous, Charity noticed something strange about her body, whatever wound she had healed quickly in a few minutes, she discovered she also had the power to heal others, she discovered this power when she put her hand on the scraped knee of a little cat boy who got hurt climbing trees. Charity now leads a double life, by day she is a mild mannered librarian at New Wolf City's Central Library, by night she calls herself Sweet Charity, her difference from most superheroes is her emphasis is not on punishing the guilty but protecting the innocent, she's more into helping people out of scrapes then beating up the wicked, however if she has to defend herself or others she can rely on the power all cobras have...venom. But if she has to bite anyone, she won't let them die, she'll always take them to the hospital, she's out to prove not all snakes are bad.

Description: Unlike most snakes, Charity has both arms and legs, she wears and orange jumpsuit and and an orange eye mask to conceal her identity, she is pure reptile as she has no breasts and she is very slender she can squeeze into places most Anthros can't go.

Where is she now?
1151.title: Sweet Charity

choices: Take him the the Lost and Found
Try to find his parents by scent
11511.content:
It was nighttime at the county fair, Charity was standing close by, making sure this would be a happy night for everyone, making sure no one would commit a crime tonight.

Just then she heard the sounds of a crying child, she took out her binoculars and scanned the area.

Among the crowd wandering aimlessly was a little Rabbit Boy, he could not have been older then two or three, he was wandering around wailing his head off.

'Why are they just ignoring him?' Charity thought 'Can't they see the poor thing is lost?!'

She quickly swooped into action, she made her way through the crowd, she followed the sound of the crying until she located the Rabbit Boy

"Hey Little Guy." She said soothingly "Where's your Mom and Dad?"

The Little Bunny seemed to upset to talk and just wailed some more

As delicately as she could, Charity took the Rabbit Boy into her arms, she wondered what she should do...
11511.title: A Lonely Child

115112.content:
Charity decided since it was rather late, she would try to find the Rabbit Boy's parents by scent, her sense of smell worked better by night then by day for some reason.

She breathed in the scent of the Little Bunny like all Rabbits he had the scent of carrots on his breath, but he also had the scent of his family.

Holding the squirming child closely, letting her cool dry scales soothe him, she focused the the many, many scents around her, the combined scents of Anthros, food, machinery and other things, and try to pinpoint that one scent that smelled like...

"Bingo." She said

Holding onto the Bunny tightly, Sweet Charity took off, her slender reptilian feet were swifter then most warm blooded Anthros realized

She found the Bunny's parents by the Ferris Wheel, they had probably been searching for hours by this time and were looking pretty desperate.

"Oh thank you Sweet Charity!" The Mother Rabbit said as she took her son into her arms

"It's OK." Sweet Charity said graciously "It's all in a day's work."
115112.title: Try to find his parents by scent

choices: Go after The Hyena and use the venom
1151121.content:
Suddenly something is wrong! Charity senses an evil presence, she rushes off and see's The Hyena and his henchmen!

She has a big choice to make, should she use her venom? Possibly inject a lethal dose? Or should she focus on healing the people he has injured
1151121.title: Hyena Attack!

choices: Just a little venom, enough to render him immobile
The Hyena is too dangerous! Inject a lethal dose!
11511211.content:
Even though she loathed to hurt anyone Charity knew The Hyena was a completely unhinged and deeply disturbed individual.

She had no choice but to stop him!

Charity leaped from building to building, she waited until she was on top of the concession stand,

She hid behind the giant plastic hamburger that decorated the concession stand. She waited until The Hyena and his goons were just underneath

"Heh heh! This is a good haul Eh Boys?"

That was when she took action, Charity dove and landed on top of The Hyena, wasting no time she bit his face and pumped venom into his body.
11511211.title: Go after The Hyena and use the venom

choices: Charity has to fight him on her own
115112111.content:
Charity couldn't really hurt anyone, not even someone as awful as The Hyena.

However before she could really inject her venom, Hyena punched her on the side of the face to get her off him.

"You really think a little venom could stop me?! He growled
115112111.title: Fight Back!

choices: Hyena breaks free of his bondage and fights the two heroes
No luck he's going to jail
1151121111.content:
Just then a bullwhip wrapped around The Hyena's legs causing him to fall.

"Tomcat Avenger!" Sweet Charity exclaimed

"Sorry I'm late." The Tomcat Avenger said as he appeared "Had a little trouble with Jack O Lantern Downtown"
1151121111.title: The Tomcat Avenger

11512.content:
Charity Serpentine was putting away some books on the shelf, she was tall enough that she could reach the top shelf without needing a stepstool. She was wearing a wool sweater with slate grey pants, when she was working at the library she wore thick glasses she didn't really need them, she just thought they made her look meeker and more unassuming, so no one would suspect she was actually Sweet Charity.

Suddenly, she felt a warm breath on the back of her neck, she turned around quickly, she saw an enormous Tiger, he had the smell of alcohol on his breath.

"My, my, my..." He purred licking his lips "Aren't you the pretty little reptile."

Charity wasn't sure what to do, she could bite him, it was within her rights, however she could just scream for help and someone might come to her aid.
11512.title: At the library

choices: The Tiger gets up again and attempts to fight
115122.content:
Charity decided not to resort to using Venom, instead she called for help

"Help!" She called "Somebody help!"

Somebody did come to help her that person was a Cat Man.

The Cat Man didn't waste time he just delivered a quick judo kick to the tiger who fell down due to his inebriation

"Are you alright Miss?" The Cat asked

"Yes." Charity said
115122.title: Call for help.

1152.content:
Name: Druid

Species: Wild Boar

Powers: The ability to control the weather, rain, snow, wind all kind of weather

Personality: Rick Tusk is a firm believer in the old pagan religions. When he discovered a book of white magic within the cellar of his Grandmother's house he discovered the ancient secrets of the druid priests, He now has the ability to control the weather, he normally uses this to help the innocent rather then punish the guilty, bringing rain to where their are droughts and bringing sunshine to where there are floods, he is a kind and helpful if solemn personality.

Description: Druid wheres a typical Celtic outfit, Earthy green ropes to emphasize his connection to nature, He is a strong healthy Boar with muscular frame and strong sharp tusks.

Where is he now?
1152.title: Druid

11522.content:
Rick Tusk was in the middle of his grocery shopping when it happened.

The Boar was in the middle of picking out a carton of orange juice, when all of a sudden he heard a gun click.

"Put all you money in a bag Lady." An Ape Man said to the young Deer Woman at the cash register

Rick was in a sticky situation, should he use his powers when he is not is costume, risk compromising his secret identity? Or should he just go call the police?
11522.title: When evil calls when you're not on duty

1153.content: Here's even more heroes to pick from.
1153.title: Still More Heroes

11531.content:
Name: Captain Cookbook

Species: Warthog

Powers: Mutant, Abnormally fat even for a warthog.

Personality: Cocky, streetsmart and a glutton, Captain Cookbook is proud of his enormous girth, he specializes in cooking fattening foods that will pack on even more pounds.

Appearance: Dresses as a stereotypical chef, with a bandanna with eye holes around his eyes.

Where is he now
11531.title: Captain Cookbook

11532.content:
Name: Rabbit Run

Race: Rabbit

Powers: Super speed, can go as faster then the speed of sound

Personality: Wally Lapine was known in his youth as a rabbit who seemed to have it all, he was the star of his track team, He had a great girlfriend, his grades were good, he had it made, then one day his powers awakened, while running a race he suddenly left all everyone behind in a sonic boom. Wally didn't know what had happened, he had run right through the fence, two miles down the road and the other runners were on the ground clutching their ears. Wally realized he had to control his powers after that, Now he only runs at top speed when it is an absolute emergency, However he is still very good natured, he is very paternal and loves children

Appearance: Rabbit Run is a brown rabbit with cream under fur, his super hero costume is a blue jumpsuit with yellow stripes shaped like lightning bolts, since his powers make it impossible to pursue his dream of being an athlete, Wally instead chose a career as musician he plays the trumpet in an old fashioned big band.

Where is Rabbit Run now.
11532.title: Rabbit Run

115321.content:
Rabbit Run was doing his usual patrol for the night he leaped from building to building with ease, it wasn't too difficult for him because his big rabbit feet made it easy for him to hop, his training as an athlete made it even more easy.

Suddenly his left ear twitched he heard something that sounded like an explosion

"Uh oh." He muttered "Sounds like trouble Downtown."

Careful not to go too fast. Rabbit Run rushed downtown to find...
115321.title: Trouble Downtown

1153211.content:
The Hyena and his two wolves Laurel and Hardy were robbing a bank, Rabbit Run knew he had to stop them!

He hopped down to the ground and thumped his foot to get their attention.

"Stop right there!" He shouted

The two wolves looked at him and cracked stupid grins

"Hey Laurel!" Hardy shouted "Look who's trying to stop us!"

"A bunny rabbit!" Cackled Hardy.

'Oh geez...' Rabbit Run thought to himself, once again he was facing the prejudice Herbivores like him faced from arrogant carnivores, not all carnivores held the view the herbivores were inferior but still some bigotries just refused to die.

"Look at his ears!" Laughed Hardy "Do you pick up radio signals with those ears Rabbit?"

"Hey is it true that Herbivores wet their beds until their eight?" Snickered Laurel

Rabbit Run decided he had enough of this and gave both wolves a super powered kick that sent them flying

Now to face The Hyena
1153211.title: The old Herbivore/Carnivore conflict

choices: Out for a night of fun
115331.content:
Name: Melody

Species: Lioness

Powers: Possess a hypnotic voice, has power over males

Personalty: Leona Jenkins always knew her voice had strange properties, when she was a teenager, she could always get a boy to do favors for her, She knew she could use this power for good or for evil, she decided to use this power for good, she called herself Melody because of the Melodic power of her voice.

Appearance: Leona dresses in a blue suit with a white cape, she wears a blue domino mask to conceal her identity.

Where is she
115331.title: Melody

1153311.content: Melody was having a quiet night, so far no one was out committing crimes since the whole fiasco with Mad Panth, she was thinking of visiting some of her favorite males...Who should she visit?
1153311.title: Patrolling

11533111.content:
Melody decided she would visit Enforcer that handsome German Shepard who was part of the police force.

Melody causally strided up to to the Dog's office.

She knocked dryly

"Come in." Was Dan's voice.

Melody strided in most seductively.

"Hello..." She said her most seductive of voices.

Dan frowned "You know you're powers don't work on me Melody.

"Yeah I know." Melody said "I was just wondering, if you needed any help."

"What kind of help?" Dan asked
"If you ever need heroine who has the power to make most men do whatever she tells them" The Lioness said
11533111.title: Enforcer

choices: Melody stops and thinks about what's been said
115331112.content:
"Sorry but no." Dan said "First of all your powers are limited, they only work on males, not females and there is an increasing number of female villains in New Wolf City like that Eco-Terrorist Panda Flora. Also sometimes your powers just don't work if a villain is enraged enough, there was one time you tried to stop Mad Path down with your voice...she just knocked you over!"

Melody growled a little she knew he was right but it was still embarrassing to hear about her past failures

"I'll be honest Melody." Dan said "You're a good friend and all but your powers are not that good and don't seem to work half the time."
115331112.title: Dan delclines

choices: Dan offers to take Melody out for a drink
Dan offers to have a suit commisened for her
1153311122.content:
Melody stopped and thought for a moment

"I hate to admit it but I think you're right." She said sadly "My powers ARE pretty limited and a lot of the time they don't work as they should...Sometimes I wonder if being a superhero was the right thing for me to do, My hypnotic powers seem more effective on regular Anthros then they do on super villains."

"You do have other strengths." Dan said "As a Lioness you have natural strengh as well as sharp teeth and claws."


"Yes." Melody said "But what you don't realize is that for a lion I'm pretty small..I was the runt of my litter."
1153311122.title: Sad But True

choices: Massive sounds good, let's go with him
115332.content:
Name: Massive

Species: Brachiosaurus

Powers: Growth: Can grow to 100 feet tall

Personality: Milo Saurus as one of the few dinosaurs in New Wolf City knew he was going to face prejudice, As a suaropod He already stood at nine feet tall, he had to stoop to get into most doorways, then his powers awakened and he discovered he had the ability to grow to 100 feet in height. Whenever he grows he has to be very careful not to crush anyone,

Appearance: Since there aren't many clothes that can easily grow with the user, Milo's super costume is nothing but a pair of magic shorts that can grow with him. Milo has blue grey scales with a cream under belly.
115332.title: Massive

1153321.content:
Massive heard on the Dino-Alarm that a crazy black panther was holding the mayor hostage. He had to do something!

Massive rushed over the building where the hostage situation was taking place, He quickly threw off his baggy oversized cloak leaving him only in his magic shorts.

"Time to get big!" Massive said He grew up to three stories high!"

He peeked in the window and found
1153321.title: Deal with a Panther

choices: Mad Panth is too terrified to respond
Mad Panth bites the hand that holds him
11533211.content:

11533221.content: Dan was sitting in the station, relaxing after a long day, and in came the police chief. He said "Sergeant Im afraid theres some trouble at the Mayors Office" "What kind of trouble, sir?" Dan replied. The Chief said "Panth has gone insane, hes strapped a bomb to the mayor and is threatening to detonate it unless hes reinstated" This struck Dan momentarily as Panth used to be his partner before he was forcefully retired to his unstable condition. The Chief continued "Your job is to get there quickly, the mayor is your first priority, try to get him to safety before dealing with Panth". Dan replied "Sir! Yes Sir!" Dan ran into the locker room, all the lockers were hand print recognition, he approached one at the end of the row of lockers, when he pressed his hand up against the scanner, the locker raised up, and his suit was behind it. He put it on then ran to the roof of the station. He activated the thruster pack and leapt of, and flew in the direction of the mayors office. When he gets there he sees?
11533221.title: Trouble at the mayors office

115332211.content: Dan lands just outside the mayors office, in the middle of a mass of spectaters, they all step back in awe, all of them wondered who he was. A reporter ran over to him, "Excuse me, are you a hero?". He replied "I am NWPD Enforcer, Ma`am I am going to need you to step aside" It was only then that he saw the Hero named Massive, who was currently three stories tall and he had Panth clutched in his hand. He used this to his advantage as Panth was distracted from the Mayor, Enforcer flew through the open window to the Mayors office and said "I am here to help you sir" He approached the Mayor and the mayor said "No, get back, that maniac strapped a bomb to me" Enforcer began studying the bomb and then came up with a solution. He said "Sir, you may feel a slight tingle" as the suit channeled power to his hand and when he placed it on the bomb, it short circuited. Enforcer then grabbed the bomb and ran to the windo, he tossed it high into the air, pulled out his pistol and shot it, safely detonating it. There was then a cheer from the crowd as Enforcer land in the middle of the crowd with the mayor in his arms. The Mayor was then rushed away in a security vehicle, Enforcer was swarmed by reporters, he then took off, leaving the other officers to deal with the Massive, Panth situation.

Back at the station Dan was praised for a job well done. He then took the suit off and got back into his uniform, he wanted to go see Panth, before he left the room he grabbed his sergeants cap.
When he arrived at Panths cell, he saw Panth was sitting in the corner, Dan coughed lightly to get Panths attention.
Panth looked at him and said "Hey Dan, long time no see, hows my favourite partner?". Dan replied "Thats former partner and Ive been doing good, wish I could say the same for you, you really got yourself into a mess this time Panth"
Panth sighed "Lapse of weakness, I havent thought straight since they kicked me off the force". Dan said "You didnt think straight when you were on the force, thats why they made you leave". Panth looked Dan in the eyes, then noticed his sergeants cap, "They made you a sergeant, when did that happen?". Dan tried to avoid eye contact and said "The day you were removed" under his breath. Panth stood up "But the day I was removed, I found out that it was the sergeant, that signed off on the papers to have me removed"
Dan sighed and said "I did for your own good Panth, I was worried something like what happened today, was going to happen"
Panth stood up and approached the bars of the cell, he reached out and grabbed Dans tie and yelled "You screwed me over, we were friends, partners" Dan eventually got free from his grasp and said "Im sorry" and then left.

11533221111122121.content:
The next day... There was a crisp, winter breeze throughout the city and there was no crime that day. Dan was given a state burial, his coffin covered with his countries flag, carried by his fellow officers, and through a Guard of Honor. All officers wore black as a sign of respect. The mourners gathered at his grave, family, friends, co-workers, and some heroes. Even Jack was there with his brother on his shoulder. People stood to say kind words, and share warm memories. Then the crowd dispersed, one by one. Finally the only one left there was Melody who knelt at his grave and between the bouquets of flowers, she laid a single rose, and wept for Dan, she said hoarsely "Im... still waiting... for you"
On a rooftop, overseeing the graveyard, stood an ebony feathered bird anthro, to his side was a shepard anthro. "Thanks again, Raven, I owe you one". Raven looked at the shepard "No Dan, now we`re even" Raven then flew off. Dan felt bad for Raven, he always had a burden to carry. Raven was in some words a hero, he had the supernatural ability, to see into the future, and call forth the spirits of the dead. He did this for Dan, he called his spirit back to the world of the living, and gave him a body identical to his one, that was just buried. Dan took in a deep breath of fresh air, then looked at Melody weeping over his grave and sighed. He decided not to regain his old life, at least not so soon, he felt it would be very hard on the emotions of those he cared about. Dan was heading to his apartment, he needed to get some things there, before moving into a new place, however since everyone in the city knew what he looked like, he needed to keep things on the down low.
Next?

He often ignores civilians during a heist or job, only hurting those who stand in his way. He is also prefers quick and painless with his killings to long and painful. And to be honest, he's lonely. He hasn't even had a decent conversation in about 1600 years, so he doesn’t kill all that often. But most importantly, he's smart. You never find him breaking anything on the evil overlord list, and he always thinks through his plans, weighing up the best solution for him and occasionally others.

Whoever wrote the previous chapter didn't leave an option to refuse. Anyone actually wanting to go down the farting bank robbery. Go click the three option (and make it if it's not written).

Villain Name: Slithering Ghost
Real Name: Madaga Isle (Female)
Age: Unknown
Species: Snake
Job: Master Thief for Hire.

Powers:
Low Detection: She is somehow able to configure her body to be hard to detect from scanners, cameras, etc.

Size Reduction: She is able to shrink herself vastly. This can cause her to look like a normal snake, like a 'harmless' garden snake.

Possession: Her favorite trick. She enters a person's body and takes control of them. No time limit. She can possibly read their mind and memories for impersonation.

Skilled with Close Combat and stealth.

Goal:
Whatever she wants to do when she isn't stealing something. She is a thief for hire and has a reputation for ruining people who double-crossed her. However, she does like trying on new bodies and information gathering on others that catch her eye either they are another villain, hero, or civilian.

Some other details:
No one has figured out who she is but know her reputation. She has successfully avoided confrontation with police and alluded any heroes that have.
125332222222.title: That Last one Did leave a 'No' Option.

info.brief_description: Play a super hero or super villain
info.description: This is a anthro version of an RPG I used to play, called Villains and Vigilantes(http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Villains_and_Vigilantes), much like the MMO City of Heroes and City of Villains. You play either a Superhero or Super villain. It takes place in the Fictional city of New Wolf City, much like our cities with a high crime rate. Can you stop the crimes or help commit them?
